TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Cikowa’ay, title = Cikowa’ay, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cikowa’ay} }

S.FORM: Cikowa'ay Itiniay i Chishang Cen no Taitung ko Cikowa'ay a niyaro', 163 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 433 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 34% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 147 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 66% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 286 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 32%, Bunun 1%, roma 1%.

Cikowa'ay Itiniay i Chishang Cen no Taitong ko Cikowa'ay a niyaro', 163 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 433 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 34% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 147 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 66% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 286 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 32%, Bonon 1%, roma 1%.
